Labyrinth Layouts

Daily labyrinth layouts and guides from PoELab.com

About Labyrinth Layouts

The labyrinth layouts change daily and are crowd-sourced by the community. PoELab.com is the most trusted source for up-to-date lab layouts, showing the shortest paths, treasure locations, and Izaro mechanics for each difficulty.

Click on any lab type below to view today's layout on PoELab.com.

Normal Labyrinth

Required level: 33+ | First Ascendancy Points

Requirements & Tips:

  • ‚Ä¢Recommended: 2000+ Life
  • ‚Ä¢Izaro has basic mechanics only
  • ‚Ä¢Shortest and simplest layout
  • ‚Ä¢2 Ascendancy Points awarded
View Today's Normal Lab

Cruel Labyrinth

Required level: 55+ | Second Ascendancy Points

Requirements & Tips:

  • ‚Ä¢Recommended: 3500+ Life, Capped Resists
  • ‚Ä¢Izaro gains additional mechanics
  • ‚Ä¢More complex layout with traps
  • ‚Ä¢2 Ascendancy Points awarded
View Today's Cruel Lab

Merciless Labyrinth

Required level: 68+ | Third Ascendancy Points

Requirements & Tips:

  • ‚Ä¢Recommended: 4500+ Life, Good DPS
  • ‚Ä¢Izaro at full strength
  • ‚Ä¢Complex layout with deadly traps
  • ‚Ä¢2 Ascendancy Points awarded
View Today's Merciless Lab

Eternal Labyrinth

Required level: 75+ | Final Ascendancy Points + Enchants

Requirements & Tips:

  • ‚Ä¢Recommended: 5500+ Life, High DPS
  • ‚Ä¢Izaro at maximum difficulty
  • ‚Ä¢Complex layout with all trap types
  • ‚Ä¢2 Ascendancy Points + Helmet/Boot Enchants
View Today's Eternal Lab

General Lab Tips

  • ‚Ä¢Study the layout before entering to plan your route
  • ‚Ä¢Bring extra life flasks and consider a bleed removal flask
  • ‚Ä¢Movement skills help navigate traps and tight spaces
  • ‚Ä¢You can log out to reset trap timing if needed
  • ‚Ä¢Complete all trials before attempting each difficulty

Izaro Fight Tips

  • ‚Ä¢Learn Izaro's attack patterns and timing
  • ‚Ä¢Disable his mechanics in phases 1 & 2 for easier final fight
  • ‚Ä¢Keep moving - most of his attacks are telegraphed
  • ‚Ä¢Bring a portal scroll to refill flasks between phases
  • ‚Ä¢Physical damage reduction is more important than resists
